column5: We are now accepting applications for the Management (Human Resource Management) course for January 2022. Please visit our website for more information.Do you aspire to be a manager? Have you got great communication skills, are you organised and decisive? Can you be impartial and objective while still getting the best out of people? If you want to impress and climb the career ladder in business management, you’ll need the inside track on how to get ahead.The MSc Management (Human Resource Management) programme at Swansea University is designed for students who are interested in the human element of business management, from classical human resource management, to areas such as leadership and managing human elements of business in a dynamic global context.
column7: Please visit our website for the Management (Human Resource Management) course fee information.
